question: What significant historical status was granted to Jihlava, Czech Republic in 1982?
true_answer: It was declared an urban monument reservation.
asked_question_translated: Aké významné historické postavenie získala Jihlava v Českej republike v roku 1982?
answer: V roku 1982 získala Jihlava status mestskej pamiatkovej rezervácie v Českej republike.
answer_translated_eng: In 1982, Jihlava was granted the status of an urban conservation area in the Czech Republic.
